name: Amber Ale
description: A well-balanced amber ale with caramel malt sweetness and a subtle hop bitterness. Medium-bodied with a clean, crisp finish.

name: Hazy IPA
description: Juicy, tropical, and hazy with intense aromas of mango, passionfruit, and citrus. Unfiltered for maximum flavor and aroma.

name: Pilsner Gold
description: Crisp, clean, and refreshing traditional pilsner with a bright golden color and subtle floral hop aroma. Perfectly balanced.

name: Wheat Hefeweizen
description: Unfiltered German-style wheat beer with distinctive banana and clove aromas. Cloudy appearance with a thick, creamy head.

name: Double Chocolate Porter
description: A decadent porter brewed with dark chocolate and cocoa nibs. Rich, smooth, and indulgent with a warming finish.
